posts._searchText: hello, flat-file world meta setup welcome to the blog that refuses to pay the database tax. each post is a .json file. the homepage reads posts/index.json and builds the list. clicking a post lo… welcome to the blog that refuses to pay the database tax. each post is a .json file. the homepage reads posts/index.json and builds the list. clicking a post loads posts/<slug>.json . how to add a new post copy posts/_template.json to posts/my-new-post.json change the slug , title , dates, tags, and html add the post entry to posts/index.json (or run the build script) that’s it. no admin panel. no plugins. no mysterious tables named wp_options doing eldritch things.
